message: If you find yourself negatively impacted by the stress of being a legal professional, this is a can't-miss presentation!

Lynn Garson, attorney, mental health advocate, and author, will lead our next free presentation, Balancing the Scales, Practical Stress Management for Lawyers, on Wednesday, September 2023 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT.
bottomline: Claim Your Seat for This Popular Program Now!
message3: Please note: This presentation is accredited for one hour of Competence Issues MCLE credit in California. If you want CLE credit, you will need to upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to take advantage of this exclusive benefit.
